name: drawBoard-TicTacTie
description: draws tictactoe board on user's terminal. you are supposed to use this tool everytime it's state changes.the board is then automatically drawn in a representable manner(GUI) to the user, you dont need to draw it

Board.description: Board in python list JSON format , values can be 'X' or 'O' or ' ' for blank example : [['O','X','O'],['O','X','O'],['O','X','X']].
